general.missing_permission: i need the **%1$s** permission in this **%2$s** to continue!
general.missing_user_permission: you need the **%1$s** permission in this **%2$s** to continue!
general.guild_only: this command **can only be used** within servers.
general.missing_argument: sorry, i couldn't recognise what you entered for **%1$s**; check the **command usage** and try again.
general.owner_only: this command **can only be used** by **bot owners**. nice try.
general.command_exception: hm, it appears as if **something strange** has happened. apologies.
general.page_prompt: please respond with the page number you would like to jump to:
general.blocked:
**%1$s** has been **blocked** from using this feature for reason: **%2$s**.
*this message will serve as your notification and you will not receive another.*

cat.description: gracefully displays a cat for your viewing pleasure
cat.error: sadly, something appears to have **gone wrong** while fetching the cat.

changes.description: learn more about sandra's latest changes
changes.reply: you can read about the latest releases from the documentation on our website.

choose.description: randomly picks one of your words from a hat

options: the space separated list of words i will choose from

choose.reply: out of %1$s options in total, i decided to go with **%2$s**.

clap.description: have sandra emphasize your important arguments

text: the text you would like to emphasize

clap.max_length: unfortunately, the text you provided is **too long** to be emphasized.

dog.description: fetches a dog from the depths of the internet

eval.description: evaluate an expression in a repl environment

script: the expression you want to evaluate

feedback.description: submit your feedback to the sandra developers
feedback.reply: please join our support server to discuss your concerns directly with the **sandra developers**.

flip.description: toss one of your coins to settle your bets
flip.no_credits: because you are broke, you don't have any coins to flip.
flip.reply: your coin sparkled in the light as it danced along the ground until it landed with **%1$s** facing upwards.

fortune.description: break open a fortune cookie to reveal your luck

help.description: view some basic quick-start information about the bot

command: view more information about this command

help.not_found: whoops, a command with that path **does not exist**. try using **/commands** to find what you're looking for.
help.required_arguments: any arguments that are enclosed with <> are required.

info_embed.invite_content: > would you like me in **your server**? **[click to invite me](%1$s)**.
info_embed.support_content: > need **more help**? chat with us in **[sandra's hangout](%1$s)**.

members.description: view a breakdown of the server's member count
members.reply: **%1$s** has %2$s humans and %3$s bots for a total of %4$s members.

mock.description: this command is such a good idea

text: the text you want to mock

ping.description: sends a ping to test sandra's connection to discord
ping.reply: it took me %1$s to **ping discord** and about %2$s to **receive your command**.

roll.description: test your luck and roll an imaginary 1d20

sides: the number of sides your dice has

roll.reply: you took a chance and rolled a **%d**.

shards.description: view a list of shards and their stats
shards.server_using: â€¢ this server is using shard %1$d

snowy.description: custom command for a good friend of mine
